Introduction: Oh, hey! You must be @!#$e#Welcome to Pelican Town!#$e#Don't mess around unless you want to get punched.
spring_Mon: Don't eat mulch.#$e#And that's on SKye'S GeNeRAl HeALtH TiPS.#$e#I said what I said.
spring_Tue: I literally can't today.#$e#Just throw me in a ditch.#$b#I'm done.
spring_Wed: I saw a stray cat the other day out near Marnie's place.#$b#It was the cutest dang thing!#$b#When I grow old, I will own 20 cats.
spring_Thu: Dylan bought me a cast iron skillet.#$b#It is my most prized possession.
spring_Fri: I'm really good at keeping plants alive.#$b#I could be a farmer like you!#$e#Uggh... Actually... nevermind...#$b#Makes me exhausted just thinking about it.
spring_Sat: What the heck did people do before allergy medication?#$b#Especially in the springtime?#$e#Just suffer, I guess.
summer_Mon: I was listening back to some of my old playlists today.#$b#What a trip down memory lane.#$e#I'm just as angsty as I used to be.
summer_Tue: This weather really makes me want to eat a pineapple.#$b#Hahaha#$e#It's an inside joke.
summer_Wed: I'm so glad I got an ice maker.#$b#Nothing like a cold drink on a hot day!#$e#I'm definitely going to have sangria later. On ice!
summer_Thu: Hey, how's it going?#$e#I feel like your eyes look different in the sun.
summer_Fri: Do you have any ibuprofen?#$b#My everything hurts.
summer_Sat: I like it when people's teeth are a bit crooked.#$b#It looks nice. It gives character!
summer_Sun: Dylan is too good for me.#$b#But just as my life would fall apart without him, his life would fall apart without me.
fall_Mon: I love crunching the fall leaves with my feet.#$e#Cronch cronch.
fall_Tue: I'm always finding recipes online.#$e#There are so many dishes that I want to make!
fall_Wed: I climbed a tree earlier.#$b#Now my body hurts and I'm covered in sap.#$e#Worth it.
fall_Thu: Look at my socks.#$b#They aren't matching.#$b#They're like that on purpose.
fall_Fri: Sometimes I don't know if I'm doing anything right.#$b#But hey, I have my friends, right?
fall_Sat: I saw Abigail at the bar yesterday, and I swear she was eating... gems?#$b#No, that can't be right, can it?#$e#Sounds absurd when I say it out loud.
fall_Sun: I think I'd look great with a beard.#$b#Just like a full, foootlong beard.#$e#Big and bushy. Like a mountain man. Or a wizard.
winter_Mon: I just found the funniest Lord of the Rings meme on my phone.#$b#Definitely gonna send that to the group chat.
winter_Tue: I appreciate a good candle.#$e#Something woody. With maybe some amber notes.
winter_Wed: I love building snowmen.#$e#I had to stop making them, though.#$b#I get too attached.#$e#I cry when they melt.
winter_Thu: Pierre is a scumbag.#$b#Caroline is too good for him.#$e#Yeah, I said what everyone else is thinking.
winter_Fri: Dylan said he'd buy me a drink tonight.#$e#We share a bank account.#$e#What a gentleman.
winter_Sat: Ughh.#$e#It's %time and I still feel like I'm half asleep.
